official_title: A bill to amend section 104 of the River and Harbor Act of 1958, Public Law 85-500 as amended, to increase the annual funding authority for the aquatic plant control program.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Acts of 1958 and 1965 to increase the annual funding authority for aquatic plant control.
